Posts.EditableText: I tried it a several times, useing the QuestJS but it didn´t work.  After useing Quest JS (quest compiler) all page links didn´t work in the result (html version). It´s better to use Sqiffy. Everything you do, is automaticly avaible in HTML. so it´s  easy to transfer it into an APK.
Posts.HTML: I tried it a several times, useing the QuestJS but it didn´t work. After useing Quest JS (quest compiler) all page links didn´t work in the result (html version). It´s better to use Sqiffy. Everything you do, is automaticly avaible in HTML. so it´s easy to transfer it into an APK.
